A

ADLDAPClient - Class in org.enhydra.shark.utilities.ldap
LDAP client that can talk with Active Directory server, and does not require any special structure to be defined on the Active Directory; hence the structure type 2.
ADLDAPClient(Properties) - Constructor for class org.enhydra.shark.utilities.ldap.ADLDAPClient
Public constructor.
ADLDAPOptions - Class in org.enhydra.shark.utilities.ldap
Options for ActiveDirectory client.

L

LDAPClient - Class in org.enhydra.shark.utilities.ldap
Connects to the LDAP server and gets wanted entries.
LDAPClient(Properties) - Constructor for class org.enhydra.shark.utilities.ldap.LDAPClient
Public constructor.
LDAPClientInterface - Interface in org.enhydra.shark.utilities.ldap
In order to be able to switch implementations of the client that is able to talk to the LDAP server I introduced this interface.
